page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: THE ONLY EXAMPLE OF EDUCATION IN OUR VILLAGE IS OUR LITTLE SCHOOL. IT IS CALLED PATTERDALE SCHOOL. THERE ARE ONLY 21 CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL. WE HAVE A BIG FIELD. THE SCHOOL IS AN OLD SCHOOL THAT HAS BEEN MODERNISED. THE SCHOOL HAS A LOT OF P.E. EQUIPMENT AND IT IS ALL MODERN. THE SCHOOL IS ALSO A CHURCH OF ENGLAND SCHOOL. NEXT DOOR TO THE SCHOOL IS THE SCHOOL HOUSE WHICH USED TO BE THE VILLAGE SCHOOL. ALSO IN OUR AREA THERE ARE EXAMPLES OF OUTWARD BOUNDS SCHOOLS. ONE IS THE PATTERDALE HALL AND ANOTHER IS THE GEORGE STARKEY HUT. ALSO THERE IS A MOUNTAIN CENTRE AT THE GREENSIDE MINE,WHERE CHILDREN COME FOR ADVENTURE HOLIDAYS.
